name: The Sheriff
storyline:
In a small lost village in the Far West, the Sheriff is on the alert! An unknown outlaw is committing crimes at different locations in the city. Who could it be? Will the Sheriff be able to catch him before all the villagers pass by?

Compete against a friend and play as the Sheriff and the Outlaw respectively in various matches. At each game, choose a new power to add some diversity to the game !

The Outlaw
Take on the appearance of a simple villager and reach your targets without being spotted by the Sheriff. Once the objective is reached, try the ultimate jackpot, and kill the Sheriff without him realizing it!

The Sheriff

Open your eyes and ears, the outlaw is somewhere in town. Monitor the behavior of the villagers and react as fast as possible when an incident occurs to catch the criminal! But be careful, it could be anyone...
summary: A dynamic hide-and-seek for two players. The Sheriff must find and kill the outlaw before all villagers die. Each round see different powers applied to each player to make each game unique. Pay attention to your back!
